text: nimage nim'ma odeyanu (higendu) vidhisiruttane; nivu avanobbana horatu berarannu pujisabaradu mattu tande tayiya jote saujan'yasilaragirabeku. Ondu vele avaralobbaru athava avaribbaru nim'ma munde mudi vayas'sannu talupidare, avareduru cakara vettabedi mattu avarannu gadarisabedi. Avara jote gauravadondige matanadiri
